description.zh: 网站流量和数字营销情报平台，提供网站排名、流量来源、受众分析、竞品对比
description.en: Website traffic and digital marketing intelligence platform providing rankings, traffic sources, audience analysis, competitor benchmarking

authority_justification.zh: 上市公司(NYSE: SMWB)，被 Google、Adobe、Walmart 等使用，全球数字营销情报标准
authority_justification.en: Public company (NYSE: SMWB), used by Google, Adobe, Walmart, global standard for digital marketing intelligence
